content:
/>
X.i.4.D.4.h
.
Jurisdiction for Payment of Compensation and DIC
The Manila RO has jurisdiction over payment of disability compensation and DIC benefits at the full-dollar rate under
PL 106-377
or
PL 108-183
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D - Awards and Payments for Benefits Due to Philippine Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D
